title: ‘No Reasons to Own’: Software Stocks Sink on Fear of New AI Tool
description: The new year was supposed to bring opportunities for beaten-down software stocks. Instead, the group is off to its worst start in years.
content: The new year was supposed to bring opportunities for beaten-down software stocks. Instead, the group is off to its worst start in years.
